content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
add a button that says hadoken
On it, adding a button that says "Hadoken".

Got it, adding a contact form for emailing Santa now.
Add a form to contact santa via email

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Would you like the contact form to be accessible from a specific section of the app or available as a floating action button on all pages?", "option1": "Specific section of the app", "option2": "Floating action button on all pages"}, {"question 2": "Do you have a preference for the fields to be included in the contact form? (e.g., Name, Email, Message)", "option1": "Yes, I have specific fields in mind", "option2": "No, standard fields are fine (Name, Email, Message)"}], "input_token_count": 270, "output_token_count": 129, "time_taken": "0:00:03.575450"}
